entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
